snippet: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
abstract: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
lead_paragraph: The Guardian: For all you foragers out there with ready access to birch trees, our recipe for birch sap wine. "Birch sap tastes almost exactly like water - but the freshest water you have ever tasted, with just a hint of sweetness.'' -- Eric Asimov
